item.title: Drug dealing/drug taking Lisson St Gardens, 2nd July
item.description:
Men gathering to buy and sell drugs by the trampoline in Lisson Street. Anti social gatherings in a children’s play area. This happens on a daily basis. Very threatening and frightening for residents and people using the play area with their children. This is a pedestrian thoroughfare connecting Broadley St and Bell St unfortunately closed to traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lisson Street, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
